title: Good Old Onion Shop
description:
Judge John Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn are clearing the docket! They talk about pizza as a snack, parents talking on the phone with their adult kids, using the rimshot sound after telling a joke, gelato tasting, and office potlucks!

Here is Jesse's guide to LA, as mentioned on the show.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn, John Hodgman)
content:encoded:
